**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [Kralgurn](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1566) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 31 **Perception** +24; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (50 arrows), [Manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [scale mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8), _ _scroll of [discern location_](/Spells.aspx?ID=75), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_, 50 gp --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +22 **Will** +25 **HP** 255 **[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**
**Intimidating Attack of Opportunity** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Kralgurn's [Attacks of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3) not only wound creatures, but also shatter their confidence. If Kralgurn hits and deals damage with an Attack of Opportunity, the target is [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), or frightened 4 on a critical hit. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _corrosive whip_ +31 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 2d4+16 slashing plus 1d6 acid **Ranged** _composite longbow_ +27 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 2d8+12 piercing **Occult Innate Spells** DC 34 - **2nd** [Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) (self only), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only) **Fearsome Brute** When Kralgurn attacks a [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creature, he gains a circumstance bonus to damage equal to three times the target's frightened value.
name: Kralgurn
